revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Durin |image = [[File:Durin.png]] |caption = This Berry is tremendously bitter. Just one bite is enough to instantly stop hiccups. |growtime = 6h 0m 0s |harvest = 33 berries |replant = 10% |points = 1,050 |flavor = {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 30 {{!}} 10 }} '''Durin''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Rabuta]] berry with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of bitter and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Rabuta]] berry will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Harvest Stages durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-10000s || 10000-14000s || 14000-18000s || 18000-21600s || 21600-43200s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:DurinTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:DurinTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:DurinTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Durin berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]]
[[Rabuta]] || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Rabuta.png|30px]]
